column2: [[J.R.R. Tolkien]] wrote '''[[Letters not published in "The Letters of J.R.R. Tolkien"|a letter]] to Billy Callahan'''

column1: *'''Subject:''' Reply to a reader. Tolkien apologizes for not being able to send a photograph
column2: but encloses signatures for Billy to attach in books.

column1: *'''Publication:''' A reproduction and transcription of the letter appeared in [[Wisterian (20 December 1968)|''Wisterian'' (20 December 1968)]].
